event.title: I Love Free Software Day, Oxford, in United Kingdom

body.p: For our series of events related to software freedom we are happy to invite everybody interested to our "I Love Free Software Day" event in Oxford! It's a great time to get involved with and help out the FLOSS communities that develop projects in the interest of everyday people, by everyday people. Let us reach out to all those amazing people behind Free Software and recognize their work by saying â€˜Thank you â™¥â€™.
